About Me

I am a 2015 graduate from the University of California, Irvine, with a Bachelors degree in Business Economics. After a year in retail management, I pursued my real passion, programming. Through a nine month apprenticeship with Bloc, I have created several web applications as well as a few amazon echo skills. I am also pursuing a Mobile Development Certificate through the University of California, Irvine. In my free time I enjoy playing basketball, hiking, and going to the beach.

Ridemetrics

A web application that compares the estimated prices and wait times of Uber and Lyft in real time using both API's. All Data that has been collected is presented to the user.

Robipedia

A web application that allows users to create, edit, and delete wikis depending on their membership, free or premium.

Robbit

A website similar to that of Reddit. Users have the capability of upvoting and downvoting posts, creating and commenting on posts, and saving posts as favorites.

Rob Chat

A real-time chat application that uses AngularJS and Firebase.

BlocJams

Bloc Jams is a replica of Spotify that allows you to play songs from various albums.

Pro Sports Trivia

A five question pro sports trivia quiz on Amazon's Alexa Platform.

World Record Facts

A skill on Amazon's Alexa Platform that returns a World Record Fact when called.
